#labels Featured
= Current Lombok feature support: =

===Current general limitations:===
 * code auto completition for a class 'A' works anywhere outside of 'A', but not in 'A' self. 
 * not all annotations are now fully supported

|| *annotation* || *supported* || *known limitations* || 
||@Getter||[http://prepaidvergleich.de/images/icon_yes.png] || none ||
||@Getter(lazy=true)||[http://prepaidvergleich.de/images/icon_yes.png] || don't need extra support from IDE, only compile time thing||
||@Setter||[http://prepaidvergleich.de/images/icon_yes.png] || none ||
||@Synchronized||[http://prepaidvergleich.de/images/icon_yes.png] ||don't need extra support from IDE, only compile time thing||
||@ToString||[http://prepaidvergleich.de/images/icon_yes.png]|| none ||
||@EqualsAndHashCode||[http://prepaidvergleich.de/images/icon_yes.png]  ||none||
||@NoArgsConstructor||[http://prepaidvergleich.de/images/icon_yes.png]  || no support for *staticName* property at the moment ||
||@AllArgsConstructor||[http://prepaidvergleich.de/images/icon_yes.png]  ||no support for *staticName* and *suppressConstructorProperties* property at the moment||
||@RequiredArgsConstructor ||[http://prepaidvergleich.de/images/icon_yes.png]||no support for *staticName* and *suppressConstructorProperties* property at the moment; IntelliJ warning for not initialized final variables (issue 2) ||
||@Data||[http://prepaidvergleich.de/images/icon_yes.png]||no support for *staticConstructor* property at the moment; IntelliJ warning for not initialized final variables (issue 2) ||
||@Delegate||[http://prepaidvergleich.de/images/icon_yes.png] ||no support for *types* and *excludes* property at the moment ||
||@CommonsLog||[http://prepaidvergleich.de/images/icon_yes.png] ||none ||
||@Log||[http://prepaidvergleich.de/images/icon_yes.png] ||none ||
||@Log4j||[http://prepaidvergleich.de/images/icon_yes.png] ||none ||
||@Slf4j||[http://prepaidvergleich.de/images/icon_yes.png] ||none ||
||@Cleanup||[http://prepaidvergleich.de/images/icon_yes.png] ||don't need extra support from IDE, only compile time thing ||
||@SneakyThrows||[http://prepaidvergleich.de/images/icon_no.png] || not supported ||
||@val||[http://prepaidvergleich.de/images/icon_no.png] || not supported ||
